keywords.indexterm: Editing Relax NG SchemasResource Hierarchy/Dependencies View

body.p: The Resource Hierarchy/Dependencies view allows you to see the hierarchy/dependencies for a schema.

If you want to see the hierarchy of a schema, select the desired schema in the project view and choose Resource Hierarchy from the contextual menu. Resource Hierarchy/Dependencies View - hierarchy for map.rng
If you want to see the dependencies of a schema, select the desired schema in the project view and choose Resource Dependencies from the contextual menu. Resource Hierarchy/Dependencies View - Dependencies for tblDecl.mod.rng

p.note: The Move resource or Rename resource actions give you the option to update the references to the resource.
